runs.comm: good length ball just outside off and with some bounce as this carries through to the keeper
slightly fuller outside off and shaping in. Defended by Nasir
slightly fuller outside off and shaping in as Nasir gets on the front foot to defend
Nasir looking to force the issue as Dale slips in a fuller one on middle and leg. Nasir advances down, but drives this one straight to mid-on
back of a length outside off and tailing in as Nasir stands solid in defence
back of a length on and around off as Nasir makes room to try and cut this away, but finds short extra-cover
fuller length ball pushed towards mid-off as Shehzad just gets to the non-strikers, with Faf doing well at silly mid-off to throw the ball close to the stumps
fuller length ball outside off and shaping away as Nasir gets a leading edge on it, with the ball flying through the vacant slip region fora boundary
length ball which is smashed through midwicket. Nasir hits this through the line, much to the delight of the partisan Dubai crowd
back of a length in the same channel as Nasir defends this on the front foot towards the off side
slower ball this time, wide of off stump as Nasir edges this past first slip, but doesn't time it sweetly, as he gets a single
full and just outside off as Shehzad looks for the expansive drive through the covers
back of a length and Nasir answers with a cross-batted swat back over Steyns' head. Doesn't hit this sweetly enough though as long-on recovers the ball before the boundary
shortish length on middle and off. Slower one this as Nasir nudges this towards the leg side
length ball outside off which Ahmed looks to club through midwicket
length ball outside off which Shehzad cuts behind to third man for a single
bangs it in short and once again Nasir employs the baseball swat, but hits this into the ground
back of a length and Nasir goes for a pull, with this resulting with the ball travelling behind to beat the keeper to the fine leg boundary
slower ball from Tsotsobe as Shehzad rushes through his pull early, with the ball carrying behind to the keeper
full slower delivery, just outside off, as Shehzad lofts over extra-cover for a couple. Didn't hit this sweetly enough unfortunately
full again in the same region as Shehzad heaves this over extra-cover again, with the ball travelling high up, but luckily falls in no-mans land, much to the delight of the Dubai crowd
slower ball again as Shehzad goes for the swing to clobber this over midwicket, but misses
drops this short and Tsotsobe is paying for this negative line as Shehzad has all the time in the world to pull this fiercely in front of square and to the boundary
length ball on middle and leg as Shehzad steps back and then punches this off the back foot through point and cover to the boundary. A shot that just oozes of class. Wonderful stuff
starts off with a slower ball which Nasir fails to get away
back of a length slower bouncer that slants heavily to the off, with the umpire calling it a wide. Seems a tad harsh though upon second viewing of the delivery
overpitched just outside off as Nasir looks to pierce the gap on the off side
slower bouncer once again as Nasir checks his pull in time to get this to square leg
back of a length and wide of off stump as Shehzad goes for a pull. Steyn fires in a throw from the ring which hits the non-striker's stumps, with the batsman already in, so an extra run allowed
back of a length slower delivery which Shehzad middles down to the deep midwicket boundary. Excellent stuff from Shehzad
Shehzad looking to flick this over the leg side but does not get a meaningful connection on it
short ball on middle and leg as Shehzad goes for a hook this time, but finds McLaren at fine-leg. Pakistan lose their first wicket. Will be interesting to see how they respond from here on in.

length ball on middle and off. Appears to strike Hafeez on the front right pad as he looks for the pull. Umpire gives it straight away, but on first glance, this was definitely not out. Was too high and even possibly missing the stumps all together. Bad decision there and some bad luck for Pakistan.
solid response from Shoaib as he gets tall to defend this to the leg side
fuller length ball on middle and off which Shoaib defends admirably
back of a length on the pads as Shoaib glances this behind square for a couple and get off the mark
fuller length ball outside off which is glided down to third man. Called no-ball as soon as the bowler finished the delivery. Huge, huge, huge no-ball there from Parnell. Free hit is on folks!
wide and outside off as Nasir cuts this away behind point, but third man was in position for the shot, and is able to stop the boundary
starts round the wicket to Nasir, who pushes this to the off side for one
flighted just outside off as Malik defends on the front foot
and Davids strikes in his first over as Nasir goes for the drive over extra-cover, and instead hits this behind to short third man, where Amla snaps at the chance gleefully
drags this one down the leg side, and turning away, as Pakistan run the wides
pitches this one wide of off stump as Maqsood drives towards extra-cover
defended on the front foot by Shoaib
this one is allowed through to the keeper, with Shoaib shouldering arms
back of a length slower ball which Maqsood gets on top off with ease
banged in short and Maqsood makes him pay with a pull through midwicket which reaches all the way to the boundary. Seems to be a trademark shot for Maqsood

fuller length ball on middle which Maqsood defends as he skips down a few steps. Tsotsobe picks up the ball in his follow through and throws the striker's stumps down, with the pair running the overthrow after it ricocheted to the leg side
back of a length delivery, shaping in from outside off as Shoaib glides this down to third man
short of a length outside off as Maqsood edges this behind to third man
Shoaib able to dab this down to third man to get the single and keep the strike
pitches outside off as Shoaib leans forward to defend
pushes this fuller length ball down to long-on
quicker ball just outside off as Sohaib drives this straight to mid-off
slightly shorter length as Sohaib hangs on the back foot to slog this over to the long-on region
Shoaib gets on the back foot to nudge this down to long-on
quicker one again just outside off as Sohaib leans into a drive down to extra-cover
full and just outside off as Maqsood just times this over extra-cover with the sweetest of hits over the boundary. Almost reminiscent of Inzy there
this one is banged in short, predictably, as Maqsood rocks back to push this towards the off side
full and just outside off as Shoaib drives this down to long-off
bouncer on leg which Sohaib is able to get on top off, although not comfortably, with the pair running a quick single
length ball outside off as Shoaib just helps it along it way with the deftest of touches to the third man boundary
short ball again from Parnell as Shoaib just keeps this in control. Definitely surprised him with that one
length ball on middle as Maqsood tucks this away to the leg side. Umar wants the second, and is sent back just in time
fuller length ball just outside off as Umar leans in a drive behind point
back of a length and turning away as Sohaib cuts straight to cover
back of a length again as Maqsood now cuts behind square on the off side. Tsotsobe, who is running this down, is able to get to it before the rope in the nick of time. Replays confirm this soon after
Umar leans into a drive but is unlucky to find short mid-off
Umar gets deep in his crease to cut this away to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off as Umar tucks this away to the leg side. The pair run hard enough to complete two, and replays confirm this soon enough
fuller length ball just outside off as Umar goes for a listless drive, with the ball beating the edge
drops this short and to the leg side as this one crashes into Umar's front pad
Umar goes for a pull straight down to deep midwicket
Sohaib goes for another pull off a McLaren snorter, but luckily enough evades deep fine leg
short again and Sohaib swats this back over McLaren's head to the boundary. Excellent stuff. Maqsood looking to turn it on
Akmal works it to backward square leg
Maqsood clips it away to backward square leg
tossed up delivery outside off, Akmal drives it down to long off

Maqsood goes for a big sweep, but misses the ball as this turns away from him on off stump. Keeper stumps Maqsood, but his foot was just behind the line, so he is safe. The final ruling is not out from the third umpire
darted in on the pads as Sohaib whisks this away to the leg side

this one goes through everyone as Umar tries to defend to the off side, with the ball pushing through the gap between batsman and stumps, past the wicketkeeper, and all the way to the fine leg boundary
Sohaib chips this delivery down to long-on
back of a length and Umar advances down to drive this wide of mid-off to the extra-cover boundary. The crowd erupt as this sails along the grass

back of a length and McLaren gets his reward as Umar obliges with a hook shot straight into the waiting hands of Tahir, stationed at fine leg. Definitely a wicket against the run of play, and South Africa sniff a chance here to get a few more
full delivery into the feet which Malik flicks to the leg side
full, slower delivery, as Maqsood gets bat on it, but French cuts it behind to the fine leg region for a couple
low full toss darting on middle as Maqsood glances this straight to Tahir at backward square leg
length ball outside off and turning away sharply as Maqsood reaches out to hit this over cover
this one turns even further away and ruled wide immediately
this one goes down the leg side as yet another wide is called. Pressure starting to get to South Africa?
Maqsood chips this over the covers for a single to get Malik on strike
Malik just eases this down to deep midwicket for one
low full toss which Sohaib hits uppishly towards long-on

Tahir strikes and takes out an important wicket in Malik as he goes for the cut, but ends up chopping onto the stumps. The partisan crowd greets the dismissal with silence. Pakistan still on top though

well notch that one to the commentator's curse as well. Razzaq, unbelievably, decides to leave a spinner on and around off, with the ball turning in, much to Razzaq's shock, and hitting the stumps. Tahir races up the wicket in celebration. Tthe South Africans know this is a big wicket considering the circumstances

Pakistan are seriously losing it. Bowls this on a good length in the off stump channel, with Maqsood looking to hit leg side, and de Kock completing a stunning take to his right. This sets of even more delirious scenes from the wickets in the previous over. South Africa starting to turn the tide in a big way. Also completes a team hat-trick for South Africa
length ball wide of off stump as Tanvir edges this behind to third man

fuller length ball on off as Afridi does the sensible thing by guiding this towards the off side with a single. Pakistan need to consolidate here. Last 14 balls have produced just 17 runs, and more importantly, four wickets
bouncer just outside off as Tanvir decides to let it through to the keeper
bangs it short again and Tanvir goes for a crudely-executed pull through midwicket
full ball just outside off as Afridi plays this behind square on the off side
yorker on middle and leg which is flicked to Amla at square leg
slower ball going past the off stump as Tanvir spots this and positions himself to paddle this over fine leg, who is in the circle, to the fine leg boundary. Excellent shot that from Tanvir
full length ball, nice and straight, as Tanvir backs away to hit this over cover, but instead finds the woodwork rearranged
back of a length slower ball as Steyn gets his line wrong, with this being called wide outside the off stump by the umpire
swinging yorker on middle which Ajmal does well to get bat on
short and going down the leg side as Afridi looks to belt this over midwicket ,but the ball instead hits him on the thigh guard
able to glance this full delivery down to fine leg
slower ball going down leg as Ajmal is unable to get bat on it, with the pair running the resulting bye. Exactly what Afridi wanted as he gets on strike
full and on middle as Afridi flicks this behind square. The pair run hard and Ajmal is able to beat the direct throw at the stumps from backward square leg
full again from McLaren as he chips this over the leg side for a single
slower bouncer, more of back of a length, as Ajmal goes for an agricultural pull towards the leg side to get off strike
banged in short outside off and it is in the zone for Afridi as he just clubs this handomsely into the crowd behind midwicket. Such a crescendo of noise resonates through DICS. The fans believe
bang on middle as Afridi pushes this down to long-off to keep strike, much to the delight of the crowd
another full delivery, this time outside off, as Afridi clips this down to the man at long-on
length ball just outside off which Ajmal fails to get a bat to
full and just shaping away as Ajmal pushes this down the ground, beating a diving mid-on, as long-on recovers the ball

nice and full and Afridi gets under it comfortably to hit these cleanly and sweetly... right into the hands of Faf du Plessis at mid-off. The crowd erupt then go flat when they realise what has just transpired, and all of a sudden the game hinges on this final wicket. Remember, Irfan is battling a hip discomfort/injury so should be interesting to see what the seven-footer has in store

back of a length ball which Irfan tries to get out of the way, with the ball popping off the face behind square on the off side. Really struggling as he gets down to the other end. Not looking good for the big lad
full again as Ajmal clips this in front of square on the leg side. A throw from the circle comes in at the striker's, where Irfan is lumbering too.
back of a length on leg stump which Ajmal pulls to the leg side for one
straight up in the blockhole and Irfan does well to keep it out. The nerves are very apparent across the crowd. 9 off 4. Dramatic stuff!

in the blockhole once more as Irfan clears his front leg to try and hammer this over the long-off boundary, but doesn't get the ball as far as it lands somewhere in between. Still struggling to get to the other end
bang on middle as Ajmal tries in vain to get under this and make something of it
really low full toss heading towards outside off as Ajmal squirts this to the off side behind square. They run the single making the equation 7 off 1. Irfan needs a six or bust
right on middle and leg and Irfan is unable to do the deed. Just plays this back towards mid-off, who intercepts the ball gleefully
